se2¶

isopy.se2(a, axis=<isopy.core.NotGivenType object>)¶

Compute the 2 standard error along the specified axis for N-1 degrees of freedom.

Shortcut for scipy.stats.sem(a, axis=axis, nan_policy='propagate') * 2.

Parameters

  • a – Isopy array or any array like object accepted by numpy.array().

  • axis – Axis along which the range is computed. If not given the default value is 0 for isopy arrays and None for numpy arrays.

Returns

If a is an isopy array and axis == 0 an isopy array is returned. Otherwise a numpy array is returned.

Return type

core.NumpyArrayLike, core.IsopyArrayLike

See also

nanse(), scipy.stats.sem
